title: Future Farming Podcast: everything you need to know about the Sustainable Farming Incentive

content.text: In the latest episode of the Future Farming Podcast, Cambridgeshire farmer Martin Lines and Sustainable Farming Incentive (SFI) lead Jonathan Marsden talk all things SFI and environmental land management.
The pair talk about current and future funding opportunities, Martin's philosophy for farming and how that can help us interpret the Sustainable Farming Incentive.
